subtitle: This tasty dish is quick and easy to make.

method.text: Trim off any excess fat from the pork and cut into strips about 5 cm long. Mix the mustard and flour together in a polythene bag. Shake well and add the pork.
Heat half the oil in a frying pan and fry the pork for 3-4 min or until brown. Remove pork and keep warm.
Add remaining oil to pan and saute mushrooms until a pale golden brown.
Return pork to pan, pour in wine, stir in yogurt and grainy mustard and season well. Bring to boil, reduce heat and simmer for about 3-4 min. Garnish with a sprinkling of paprika.

title: Mustard pork
